title: My Introduction
description: Designed a sleek and intuitive interface for creation of Print on Demand T-shirts and for users to browse art pieces and purchase them securely online.

title: Sketching and Art
description: Art is something which runs through my emotions. It will be not fair to call it a hobby. I draw portraits, sketches, landscapes and anything that catches my eye. Fun Fact: I doodle better than I draw.

title: Music
description: Music is my coffee #fuel, it helps me reduce my stress, makes me feel lively. I majorly listen to DHH tracks and old classical songs. I more likely to listen to tracks that hold some real life scenarios.

title: Philosophy
description: Philosophy is my guiding light #insight, helping me navigate life's complexities and deepen my understanding of existence. I'm drawn to existentialist and stoic teachings, finding solace and wisdom in their perspectives on human nature and resilience.
